turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a coffee from the Starbucks on Fireworks Alley in St. Augustine, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok sec, let me find that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, What can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a cinnamon shortbread latte. It's size is grande and with some coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a grande, Cinnamon Shortbread Latte with coconut milk, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let's add whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing, added it for you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and just to make sure, this is hot, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect got it! anything else for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, give me a moment to send it on over to your selected location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye bye.
